SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc27
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Net

Interface VirtualView

All Superinterfaces:
Remote, Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientHandler, RmiClient, SocketClient
public interface VirtualView extends Remote, Serializable
The VirtualView interface represents a client's view in the application. It provides methods for displaying messages, reading input, setting username, running the client, sending commands, getting the MiniModel, updating messages, closing the connection, and pinging the server. This interface extends the Remote and Serializable interfaces to allow its methods to be called from a non-local JVM.
